form.label: Application Browser
form.description: Choose an application to view available crash data

input.label: Select an Application:
input.populatingSearch: index=crittercism sourcetype=crittercism | stats dc by appName, appId

single.title: Crash Rate
single.searchString: index=crittercism sourcetype=crittercism MessageType=AppSummary appName=$appName$| table crashPercent | head 1

single.title: Total Crashes
single.searchString: index=crittercism sourcetype="crittercism" "MessageType=DailyCrashes" appName=$appName$ | head 1 | fields + dailyCrashes

single.title: App Loads
single.searchString: index=crittercism sourcetype="crittercism" "MessageType=DailyAppLoads" appName=$appName$ | head 1 | fields dailyAppLoads

single.title: Daily Users
single.searchString: index=crittercism sourcetype=crittercism MessageType=AppSummary appName=$appName$ | table dau | head 1

single.title: Monthly Users
single.searchString: index=crittercism sourcetype=crittercism MessageType=AppSummary appName=$appName$ | table mau | head 1

single.title: App Store Rating
single.searchString: index=crittercism sourcetype=crittercism MessageType=AppSummary appName=$appName$ | table rating | head 1

table.title: Crash by OS
table.searchString: index=crittercism sourcetype="crittercism" "MessageType=DailyCrashesByOS" appName=$appName$ | head 1| rex "\((?<os>\".*?\")\,(?<val>\d+)" max_match=30 | eval fields=mvzip(os,val) | mvexpand fields | rex field=fields "\"(?<OS>.*?)\",(?<CRASHES>\d+)"| sort -CRASHES | table OS, CRASHES

table.title: App Loads by Device
table.searchString: index=crittercism sourcetype="crittercism" "MessageType=DailyAppLoadsByDevice" appName=$appName$ | head 1| rex "\((?<os>\".*?\")\,(?<val>\d+)" max_match=30 | eval fields=mvzip(os,val) | mvexpand fields | rex field=fields "\"(?<OS>.*?)\",(?<COUNT>\d+)"| sort -COUNT | table OS, COUNT

table.title: App Service Error Rates
table.searchString: index=crittercism sourcetype="crittercism" "MessageType=DailyServiceErrorRates" appName=$appName$ | head 1| rex "\((?<serv>\".*?\")\,(?<val>\d+\.\d+)" max_match=30 | eval fields=mvzip(serv,val) | mvexpand fields | rex field=fields "\"(?<SERVICE>.*?)\",(?<RATE>\d+\.\d{2})"|sort -RATE | table SERVICE,RATE

chart.title: Application Crashes (Daily) Over TIme
chart.searchString: index=crittercism sourcetype="crittercism" "MessageType=CrashCounts" appName=$appName$ | head 1| rex "\((?<xdate>\d{4}\-\d{2}\-\d{2}?)\,(?<val>\d+)" max_match=32 | eval fields=mvzip(xdate,val) | mvexpand fields | rex field=fields "(?<CrashDate>\d{4}\-\d{2}\-\d{2}?),(?<CRASHES>\d+)" | chart values(CRASHES) as CrashCount by CrashDate
